Others: Schmidt joined the Yankees' rotation after returning from a right lat strain.
Schmidt pitched into the fifth inning, allowing four hits in 75 pitches.
Cortes made his first relief appearance since 2021, holding Chicago hitless for 4 1/3 innings.
The Yankees secured their 32nd consecutive winning season, tying for the second-longest streak in MLB history.
The win was the Yankees' second consecutive shutout and their first series victory since August 23-25 against the Rockies.
